Reviews.Title: good product
Reviews.Author: bharat n.
Reviews.Content: If all cameras are recording then maximum frame rate per camera is 15 frames per second (( records at 240 frame for total 16 cameras ))

ProductInfo.Features:
Adopt standard H.264 format
Support up to 2 TB HDD & 4 x HDD
Support VGA / CVBS / HDMI Output
Utilize graphic user interface
Support full mouse control; Support dual stream
Support IE browser to remote view
Support mobile surveillance by phones with Andriod, Balckberry, WinCE, Symbian, and iPhone
Support AVI converter; Support CMS software for multi devices central management
Support multi-level user management. Administrator can manage the operating rights of other users
Support DVD & USB Backup
Support event log. Users can check the working status of the DVR by this
Only connect to HD-SDI Cameras
ProductInfo.Name: GW Security Professional 16 Channel CCTV Surveillance Video H.264 HD-SDI Security DVR - 1080P (1920 x 1080) Real Time Recording, iPhone, Andriod Viewing. HDMI & VGA. Utilize graphic user interface. Preview, recording, and network live, backup, playback, USB2.0 Backup, PTZ Control (*HDD is not installed*)
